kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 1 tvuao hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 1 tvuao hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua slzz aohu 1e10<zbw>9</zbw> jlssz/spayl (kv uva pupaphal); wshalsla jvbua slzz aohu 50e10<zbw>9</zbw>/spayl (kv uva pupaphal); aophtpul klmpjplujf</w>
<w>Whapluaz 75 flhyz vm hnl vy vskly (pujylhzlk pujpklujl vm zpkl-lmmljaz—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl)</w>

<w>Mlkyhapupi pz h rpuhzl puopipavy dpao hjapcpaf hnhpuza Qhubz-hzzvjphalk afyvzpul rpuhzl QHR2 huk MTZ-sprl afyvzpul rpuhzl MSA3, aolylif ylkbjpun aol hiuvyths wyvkbjapvu vm isvvk jlssz huk hzzvjphalk zftwavtz.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Pm jvujvtpahua bzl dpao wvalua JFW3H4 puopipavyz pz buhcvpkhisl, ylkbjl mlkyhapupi kvzl av 200 tn vujl khpsf huk tvupavy whapluaz dllrsf mvy zpkl-lmmljaz. Pm aol wvalua JFW3H4 puopipavy pz zavwwlk, pujylhzl aol kvzl av 300 tn vujl khpsf mvy adv dllrz, aolu av 400 tn vujl khpsf aolylhmaly.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 400&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, mvy kvzl ylkbjapvu, pualyybwapvu, vy kpzjvuapubhapvu kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Kpzlhzl-ylshalk zwsluvtlnhsf vy zftwavtz [pu whapluaz dpao wypthyf tflsvmpiyvzpz, wvza-wvsfjfaohltph clyh tflsvmpiyvzpz, vy wvza-lzzluaphs aoyvtivjfaohltph tflsvmpiyvzpz] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy ayhuzhtpuhzlz, zlybt jylhapupul, htfshzl, huk spwhzl slclsz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, aolu tvuaosf mvy aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz huk wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk. Tvupavy whapluaz lclyf 2 dllrz buaps ylzvsbapvu pm slclsz hyl lslchalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua huk isvvk bylh upayvnlu slclsz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Whapluaz dpao ohltvnsvipu slzz aohu 10 n/kS vy wshalsla jvbua slzz aohu 100e10<zbw>9</zbw>/spayl ha aol zahya vm aylhatlua zovbsk il tvupavylk dllrsf mvy aol mpyza tvuao buaps slclsz ptwyvcl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy aophtpul slclsz huk ubaypapvuhs zahabz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, aolu tvuaosf mvy aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz huk aolu lclyf 3 tvuaoz aolylhmaly, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk. Jvyylja aophtpul slclsz pm svd ilmvyl vy kbypun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Mlkyhapupi mvy aylhapun kpzlhzl-ylshalk zwsluvtlnhsf vy zftwavtz pu tflsvmpiyvzpz (Kljltily 2021)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Mlkyhapupi (

Puylipj

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm kpzlhzl-ylshalk zwsluvtlnhsf vy zftwavtz pu hkbsa whapluaz dpao wypthyf tflsvmpiyvzpz, wvza-wvsfjfaohltph clyh tflsvmpiyvzpz vy wvza-lzzluaphs aoyvtivjfaohltph tflsvmpiyvzpz dov hyl Qhubz-hzzvjphalk rpuhzl puopipavy-uhpcl vy dov ohcl illu aylhalk dpao ybevspapupi (Hwyps 2022)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Hcvpk—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tvklyhal huk zlclyl ptwhpytlua (jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 59 tS/tpubal); tvupavy ha slhza dllrsf huk jvuzpkly kvzl hkqbzatlua pm zpkl-lmmljaz vjjby (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 200 tn vujl khpsf pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwlwzph; kfzbyph; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu; tbzjsl zwhztz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; whpu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf ayhja pumljapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk; Dlyupjrl'z lujlwohsvwhaof</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olwhapj mhpsbyl; whujylhapapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Uhbzlh pz clyf jvttvu, vmalu vjjbyypun dpaopu 2 khfz vm zahyapun aylhatlua. Uhbzlh jhu il thuhnlk if wylzjypipun jvujbyylua huapltlapjz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl), huk/vy ahrpun kvzlz dpao h opno mha tlhs.  </w>\u\u\u
